thobe.widgets.buttons

Class TransparentIconButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton
            • javax.swing.JButton
              • thobe.widgets.buttons.IconButton
                • thobe.widgets.buttons.TransparentIconButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class TransparentIconButton
extends IconButton
    Class representing an button having an Icon and no text, no margin etc. The buttons disabled and enabled icons will be displayed semi-transparent.
    Author:
    Thomas Obenaus
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
